Album packaging design

graphic design

2022â€”now Hora is an independent label based in Thiene, Vicenza, Italy, dedicated to promoting a diverse range of creative works. Collaborating with Hora, I designed multiple album layouts, cover artworks, and a variety of promotional materials, spanning both print and digital formats. The work requires a flexible approach to visual storytelling, adapting each design to reflect the unique character of the music while maintaining a cohesive identity for the label. Through this collaboration, I explored the interplay between graphic design and music, creating visuals that enhance the audience's experience and support the label's mission to showcase innovative and eclectic artistic expressions.
